body_html:
Thanks @ymodak

I have referred to this document already. Current I am doing online prediction. As per the documentation..

Online prediction logs
Your online prediction requests don't generate logs by default. You can enable Stackdriver Logging when you create your model resource:

So I have used the tag "--enable-logging" when creating the model, and I am able to do the prediction using "gcloud local". But when I exported the model to ml-engine, and doing online prediction, I am getting some variable uninitialization error as below.

{
  "error": "Prediction failed: Error during model execution: AbortionError(code=StatusCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION, details=\"Attempting to use uninitialized value shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias\n\t [[Node: shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias/read = Identity[T=DT_FLOAT, _output_shapes=[[2048]], _device=\"/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0\"](shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias)]]\")"
}

This error is quite unclear, and also there is no stack trace provided in logs.
If anyone had success with gcloud ml-engine prediction logs, please help.
body_text:
Thanks @ymodak
I have referred to this document already. Current I am doing online prediction. As per the documentation..
Online prediction logs
Your online prediction requests don't generate logs by default. You can enable Stackdriver Logging when you create your model resource:
So I have used the tag "--enable-logging" when creating the model, and I am able to do the prediction using "gcloud local". But when I exported the model to ml-engine, and doing online prediction, I am getting some variable uninitialization error as below.
{
  "error": "Prediction failed: Error during model execution: AbortionError(code=StatusCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION, details=\"Attempting to use uninitialized value shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias\n\t [[Node: shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias/read = Identity[T=DT_FLOAT, _output_shapes=[[2048]], _device=\"/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0\"](shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias)]]\")"
}

This error is quite unclear, and also there is no stack trace provided in logs.
If anyone had success with gcloud ml-engine prediction logs, please help.
body:
Thanks @ymodak 

I have referred to this document already. Current I am doing online prediction. As per the documentation..

Online prediction logs
Your online prediction requests don't generate logs by default. You can enable Stackdriver Logging when you create your model resource:

So I have used the tag "--enable-logging" when creating the model, and I am able to do the prediction using "gcloud local". But when I exported the model to ml-engine, and doing online prediction, I am getting some variable uninitialization error as below.
```
{
  "error": "Prediction failed: Error during model execution: AbortionError(code=StatusCode.FAILED_PRECONDITION, details=\"Attempting to use uninitialized value shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias\n\t [[Node: shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias/read = Identity[T=DT_FLOAT, _output_shapes=[[2048]], _device=\"/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0\"](shadow/LSTMLayers/stack_bidirectional_rnn/cell_0/bidirectional_rnn/fw/basic_lstm_cell/bias)]]\")"
}
```

This error is quite unclear, and also there is no stack trace provided in logs.
If anyone had success with gcloud ml-engine prediction logs, please help.
